{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3122071,"name":"regis ABekale","username":"regis_ABekale","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/r/13edae/{size}.png","created_at":"2023-01-10T16:07:37.030Z","cooked":"

Hi!

I would to calibrate my Falcon 500. It is always in bootloader state. Any help would be appreciated.

20230110_0822511920×2560 220 KB

Thank you!

Solved!!

The solution was:

  • Isolate the faulty Falcon motor (minimal CAN connection: PDP-roboRIO-Falcon motor)
  • Run Phoenix Tuner
  • Update the faulty Falcon motor firmware

Hope it helped.

Hi @Technologyman00 ,

The solution was:

  • Isolate the faulty Falcon motor (minimal CAN connection: PDP-roboRIO-Falcon motor)
  • Run Phoenix Tuner
  • Update the faulty Falcon motor firmware

Hope it helped.
